title: Large Bank Consumer Mortgage Originations: Original Loan Size: 50th Percentile
notes: The 50th percentile first lien loan size originated in the observed quarter. These data include total bank loans originated and held in portfolio in a given quarter, including those that will later be sold or securitized. For more detail see: methodology (https://www.philadelphiafed.org/-/media/frbp/assets/surveys-and-data/y14/y-14-data-methodology).
